t: Shop superfoods, Mushrooms & Adaptogens - Four Sigmatic
s: Four Sigmatic is a superfood company founded by a group of Finnish Funguys. We aim to popularize functional mushrooms and adaptogens by incorporating them in mainstream products like coffee, tea and cacao. We were founded in 2012 and came to the U.S. in 2015.
